title: Jarvan 72% win rate in Top Lane

replies.body: When you get into those 125+ games experienced range, the sample size tends to be very small.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sotere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Au0t2ak9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-28T20:29:01.934+0000)
>
> When you get into those 125+ games experienced range, the sample size tends to be very small.

But that must also mean someone's playing him to a level they are performing extraordinarily well. That someone or some amount of people have either found a very effective strategy or perhaps a hidden OP or maybe some more games might perhaps level out the win rate back to ~54%. On the interesting side of things, Jarvan top lane has been sitting at 54% win rate on an average basis for the last 2 patches on champion.gg and surpassed kayle both patches.
And wasn't kindred nerfed repeatedly for the same reason that OP is asking for with jayce?.....

what are u smoking? It's 53.91%. 
He's only 72% win rate top because theres probably only like 2 people that have 125+ games top lane with him.

> [{quoted}](name=King of Hearts11,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Au0t2ak9,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-28T20:27:04.025+0000)
>
> How? Someone explain plz
